Trade/Device Name(s): POGO Automatic Blood Glucose Monitoring System
POGO® AutomaticTM Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for POGO Automatic Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative glucose measurement in capillary whole blood using integrated photometric technology.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertips by a single person (adults/adolescents 13+), for self-testing at home to monitor effectiveness of diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
